meanings.definition: Unable to be explained or understood.
meanings.sent1: The magic trick was unexplainable to the audience.
meanings.sent2: The mystery surrounding the old house was unexplainable.
meanings.sent3: It was unexplainable how the cat managed to open the locked door.
meanings.sent4: The unexplainable beauty of the sunset left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent5: The unexplainable phenomenon puzzled scientists for years.

meanings.definition: Not able to be clarified or rationalized.
meanings.sent1: The sudden change in weather was unexplainable.
meanings.sent2: Her unexplainable behavior worried her friends.
meanings.sent3: It was unexplainable why the traffic suddenly stopped.
meanings.sent4: The unexplainable decision left everyone confused.
meanings.sent5: The unexplainable delay caused frustration among the passengers.
